true q8ELys+H0mTSABL54Z2+t+8mf7M= false 1 com.snc.knowledge_serviceportal com.snc.knowledge_serviceportal

The Knowledge Management Service Portal is a web interface that is based on the ServiceNow Service Portal framework. It includes a homepage, a search results page, and an article view page. It is where your users come to view knowledge bases and articles, search for information, sort and filter search results, and provide feedback. 

 Set up your knowledge homepage, article view page, and search to create an attractive and engaging user experience.
